name: Hair Design Guide 2
description: Syllia's latest Hair Design Guide. After use, You can move to the barber shop to try [The Fissure] (male) or [The Goddess Kiss] (female)

name: Hair Design Guide 3
description: Syllia's latest Hair Design Guide. After use, You can move to the barber shop to try The Wind (male) or The Blessing (female)

name: Hair Dye
description: A magic potion to dye the hair any color.

name: Hair Dye Recipe
description: A required material for producing hair dyes.

name: Hair Dye·Colorful
description: You can change your style freely with this! (Select an unlocked hair color and dye your hair for free once! The voucher will be used first when dye your hair. )

name: Hairband Of Reginleif
description: The headdress named after Valkyrie Randgris Reginleif.

name: Hairband Of Reginleif Blueprint
description: The headdress named after Valkyrie Randgris Reginleif.

name: Haircut Voucher
description: You can change your style freely with this! (Select an unlocked hair style and do your hair for free once! The voucher will be used first when you go to a Barber Shop. )

name: Hairpin
description: If you look closely, it's a decoration that can be filled with things.

name: Hairpin [1]
description: If you look closely, it's a decoration that can be filled with things.

name: Hairpin [1] Blueprint
description: If you look closely, it's a decoration that can be filled with things.

name: Halberd [1]
description: The double-handed spear is very handy. You can use it to make all kinds of movements. The disadvantage is that the spear is not easy to use in narrow places.

name: Halberd [2]
description: The double-handed spear is very handy. You can use it to make all kinds of movements. The disadvantage is that the spear is not easy to use in narrow places.

name: Halloween Gashapon
description: A Gashapon toy to express personal feelings, open it to randomly receive one headwear of Nov 2017 [Halloween Party] series.

name: Halloween Night
description: The old silver edged book sits quietly on ground of the abandoned chapel of the Earl Castle. Outside the shattered stained glass, It's the cold moonlight. Through the air dust that seems to condense in the time, it shines on the clock without the long pointer. Suddenly with a click, the short pointer indicates the number 12 (0)...

name: Halloween Pumpkin
description: It looked like an ordinary pumpkin, but when you opened it up, You could smell the sweet aroma of mashed pumpkin with fresh cream. Recover 20% SP (SP Regen ＋10%, For 30 min)

name: Halo
description: Halo above the dead's head when going to the heaven. It doesn't have the hiding effect when you wear it.

name: Halo [1]
description: Halo above the dead's head when going to the heaven. It doesn't have the hiding effect when you wear it.

name: Halo [1] Blueprint
description: Halo above the dead's head when going to the heaven. It doesn't have the hiding effect when you wear it.
